headline.main: Field Guns Pave Way; ITALY IS INVADED BY ALLIED ARMY

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEAQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Sept. 3 (U.P.) -- British, Canadian and other troops of the British Eighth Army spearheaded the invasion armies, swarming across the Strait of Messina from Sicily under cover of Allied aircraft and the big guns of British and American warships.
abstract: Reggio Calabria, Crotone, Catanzaro and Cosenza seen as immediate major objectives
